pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Leader of the Official Opposition Erin O’Toole | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Leader of the Official Opposition Erin O’Toole.

The Prime Minister updated Mr. O’Toole on President-elect Biden’s incoming administration. The Prime Minister highlighted our priority of fighting COVID-19, as well as several key issues including climate change, trade, NORAD, support for Michael Kovrig and Michael Spavor, and the Keystone XL project, which the Prime Minister raised in his conversation with the President-elect.

The Prime Minister and Mr. O’Toole also discussed the COVID-19 pandemic, as well as vaccine distribution in Canada.
